meanings.sent1: The unoiled door hinges creaked loudly.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic recommended oiling the unoiled engine parts.
meanings.sent3: The unoiled bicycle chain made a funny squeaky sound.
meanings.sent4: Her hair, unoiled and messy, stuck out in all directions.
meanings.sent5: The unoiled gears in the clock refused to turn smoothly.

meanings.definition: Not coated or treated with oil
meanings.sent1: The unoiled salad dressing tasted bland.
meanings.sent2: The unoiled pan caused the food to stick.
meanings.sent3: The unoiled frying pan looked like a mirror.
meanings.sent4: His unoiled boots left dusty footprints behind.
meanings.sent5: The unoiled wood absorbed the paint unevenly.
